The hasher uses a per-execution seed value that is set during process startup, usually from a high-quality random source.

# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new hasher.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

The hasher uses a per-execution seed value that is set during process startup, usually from a high-quality random source.
title: init()
